The following are outside resources we are providing for your convenience.

Outside Resources

Career Development:
www.careerbuilder.com
www.monster.com

Higher Education Resources:
Florida International University .
Phone 305.348.2000
www.fiu.edu

Bankruptcy
www.usdoj.gov/ust

Credit Bureaus and credit score resources:
Equifax Information Services LLC
P.O. Box 740241 Atlanta , GA 30374
or call
800-685-1111

To obtain your credit score:

How to obtain a credit report:
www.annualcreditreport.com

Equifax Information Services LLC
PO Box 105167
Atlanta , GA 30348
or call 1-877-SCORE-11 or visit www.equifax.com

TransUnion
Post Office Box 2000
Chester , PA 19022
www.transunion.com

Experian:
Order online and get immediate access to your report and score.
Order a Experian credit report by phone: 888 397 3742
Or visit www.experian.com

To report ID theft on Experian :
Contact by phone: 888 397 3742

Information on Consumer Credit Statistics:
The Federal Reserve
www.Federalreserve.gov

The following is a resource where you can download and install antivirus and anti spy ware software. Some are free, others are free to try, and others are to be purchased.

www.download.com

To get information about Fair Credit Reporting Act and ID theft:
The Federal Trade Commission:

www.ftc.gov

Information on Encryption:
http://computer.howstuffworks.com/encryption.htm

Consumer Information Services:

Healthcare:
www.webmd.com
www.healthsavings.com

Housing:
www.hud.gov

Mortgages:
http://mbaa.org/

Moving Resources:
www.homefair.com

Mental Health Counseling:
www.counseling.org
www.apa.org

Marriage Counseling:
www.divorcestopper.com
www.marriagesolutions.org

Life Coaching:
www.mindtools.com

Substance abuse:
www.drug-rehab.com
www.Findtreatment.samhsa.gov

The actual Specialty Consumer Reports are as follows and this is how you can obtain yours:

Home and Insurance Reports

ChoicePoint CLUE Reports:
ChoiceTrust.com
1-866-312-8076

ISO Insurance Services A-Plus Reports:
Iso.com
1-800-627-3487

Medical Reports

Medical Information Bureau:
Mib.com
1-800-627-3487

Tentant Reports

ChoicePoint:
ChoiceTrust.com
1-877-448-5732

SafeRent:
1-888-333-2413

UD Registry:
UDregistry.com
1-888-275-4837

Check Writing Reports

ChexSystems:
ConsumerDebt.com
1-800-428-9623

Shared Check Authorization Network:
ConsumerDebt.com
1-800-262-7771

TeleCheck:
1-800-209-8186

Credit Card Act of 2009

http://www.opencongress.org/bill/111-s392/text
